<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Fiendsbane Oath](/Feats.aspx?ID=220)

**Trigger**
You use your champion's reaction, triggered by a [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) within your reach.

</column>

---

The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks. You attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the fiend that triggered your champion's reaction; on a success, the target can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 minute. On a critical success, the target is also [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) and can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 hour, and if you are on your home plane and the target is a fiend of level 18 or lower from another plane, it is also banished to its home plane. Your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this attack.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs.

**Related Feats**: [Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240), [Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245), [Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247), [Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250), [Verdant Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1251)
